items.title: Digital Transformation: Setting up & running an RPA CoE team

visible_instructors.job_title: Passionate about empowering you in digital transformation!

items.headline: Good teams automate ...GREAT teams deliver value. Robotic Process Automation Centre of Excellence teams need a framework
objectives_summary: Learn about setting up a Centre of Excellence (CoE) team for Intelligent Automation
Learn about the AEIO YOU methodology, a tested framework for implementing cutting edge technologies like Robotic Process Automation  (RPA), Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Learn about the benefits of using a framework to avoid common pitfalls and mistakes most RPA and AI implementation teams make and learn how to overcome common challenges
